backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, platform catalog entries, submission plans, content drafts, keyword metrics, and access‑controlled query/update methods with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for build traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON listing short summaries of various frontend i18n, submission, and platform page components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts, setting RTL Persian defaults, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring TanStack Router routes, theme/i18n providers, and auth/admin‑guarded pages.
frontend/src/components/analyzer/SeoAnal: Component rendering SEO analysis results with scores, checks, and suggestions for a content draft.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with localized text and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save basic user info.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper enforcing admin‑only access, showing loading state or an access‑denied screen as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children with authentication checks, showing loading or access‑denied screens and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Displays an access‑denied message with a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDi: A reusable confirmation dialog using alert‑dialog components with customizable title, description, and confirm handling.
frontend/src/components/content/DraftEdi: Provides a full editor UI for modifying content drafts, including sections, metadata, and saving via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/content/ExportAc: Generates markdown from a draft and offers copy‑to‑clipboard and file download actions.
frontend/src/components/content/ImageUpl: Handles image selection, preview, and removal using ExternalBlob for storage compatibility.
frontend/src/components/content/TopicInp: Lets users create a new content draft by entering a topic and optional image, then initializes default sections.
frontend/src/components/keywords/ManualK: Allows manual entry and management of keywords with target density, displaying them in a table.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, language toggle, authentication‑aware links, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/platforms/Platfo: Provides category and country filter controls for platform listings with a clear‑filters option.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Stat: Displays a status badge with a variant and label based on the listing status using translations.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Form component allowing users to edit and save submission plan fields including status, URL, and notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, platform catalog actions, and submission plans using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Manages app language and direction, persists selection, and provides a translation function.
frontend/src/i18n/messages.ts: Contains Farsi translation strings for navigation, submissions, platforms, content, and other UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and theme variables with RTL/LTR typography, dark mode, and layout adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDraftsPage: Admin page showing a placeholder message for drafts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKeywordsPa: Admin page showing a placeholder message for keywords.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPerformanc: Admin performance page with a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformsP: Displays searchable platform list with add button and table view.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSubmission: Admin submission plans page showing a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/content/ContentWorksp: Content workspace for creating drafts, editing, and running SEO analysis.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a hero section and feature cards linking to major site areas.
frontend/src/pages/keywords/KeywordTools: Keyword tools page offering manual keyword entry.
frontend/src/pages/performance/Performan: Performance tracking page with a placeholder message.
frontend/src/pages/platforms/PlatformDet: Shows detailed platform info and allows logged-in users to add it to a submission plan.
frontend/src/pages/platforms/PlatformsLi: Platform listing page with search, filters, and navigable platform cards.
frontend/src/pages/submissions/Submissio: Displays submission plan stats and a list of plans with status badges and an inline editor per platform.
frontend/src/utils/locale.ts: Provides Persian number/date formatting helpers plus line-break preservation and word counting.
frontend/src/utils/seoAnalyzer.ts: Analyzes SEO drafts by checking word count, meta description, keywords, structure, tags, and reading time to produce a score and suggestions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing platform goals, requirements, features, and image assets for a Persian-first SEO and content system.
